trans-unit.source: Configures the authentication for a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Web 應用程式的驗證。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `authentication` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationSection 類別可用來以程式設計方式存取和修改`authentication`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The AuthenticationSection can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AuthenticationSection 可將資訊寫入至組態檔，根據定義的區段屬性，<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值為<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition></xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>限制的相關區段

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser.
trans-unit.target: 任何嘗試寫入組態檔不允許在階層中的層級，將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性和延展性，建議您使用外部儲存機制，例如資料庫、 使用，來保留使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationSection 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection>

trans-unit.source: A Forms element property that contains information used during forms-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: Form 項目屬性，其中包含表單型驗證期間使用的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authentication modality.

trans-unit.target: 取得 Passport 項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: A Passport element property that contains information used during passport-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: Passport 項目屬性，其中包含 passport 驗證期間使用的資訊。
